column22: I am a mommy of three beautiful boys, I want a home for them my husband is disabled and epileptic, We have tried to find programs to help us get a home for my boys we have moved 3 times in 2 years, now we are being thrown out again, and we have no where to go, I need a home. I go to school online and now I cannot because I dont have a home, I worked 2 jobs until I got kicked out of my home and couldn't do it I had to find a home, and try to take care of my kids the best way I could and now living on only  the little 688.00 check from disability we cannot find a home or a low income program , I am open for suggestions, and my email is dreamadj@yahoo.com, thanks to all my supporters.
